01000100 10100110 01011010 d

3
00001000 10010100 11001011 d>>3
[1]<<5     [2]>>3
11000000 | 00001011 = 11001011

6
00000001 00010010 10011001 d>>6
[1]<<2     [2]>>6
10011000 | 00000001 = 10011001

9 = 1
00000000 00100010 01010011 d>>9
[0]<<7     [1]>>1
00000000 | 01010011 = 01010011

12 = 4
00000000 00000100 01001010 d>>12
[0]<<4     [1]>>4
01000000 | 00001010 = 01001010

15 = 7
00000000 00000000 10001001 d>>15
[0]<<1     [1]>>7
10001000 | 00000001

10001000 | 00000001 = 10001001

18 = 2
00000000 00000000 00010001 d>>18
[0]>>2
00010001

21 = 5
00000000 00000000 00000010 d>>21
[0]>>5
00000010
